full_summary:
====================================

**Title:** Laboratory Scientific Equipment - Growth Chamber

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01009257
**Solicitation Number:** 01B46-22-115

**Publication Date:** October 5, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 14, 2022, 14:00:00 EST

**Contracting Entity:**
------------------------

*   Contracting Entity Name: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
*   Address: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0C5
*   Contact Person: Lauzier, Claudia 
    *   Email: [claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca)
    *   Telephone: 438-455-2392
    *   Address: 2001, Robert-Bourassa, Montréal, QC, Canada, H3A 3N2

**Tender Description:**
-------------------------

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Research and Development Center in St. John’s has a requirement to purchase one (1) commercial-grade growth chamber, specifically the Air-Cooled Reach-In Model Growth Chamber.

**Tender Status:**
-------------------

This tender is **Expired**. Therefore, please do not submit any bids.

**Technical Information:**
---------------------------

The Growth Chamber is a specialized piece of laboratory equipment used for plant growth experiments. It provides a controlled environment for plants to grow, giving researchers accurate and reliable data to aid in agricultural research.

The successful bidder will provide the growth chamber along with any necessary installation or maintenance services to ensure that it is operational and ready for use upon delivery to the Research and Development Center in St. John’s.

**Additional Information:**
---------------------------

For more information about the tender or the procurement process, please refer to the attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/05/a125bf6784cbb45c6c6652ccdfd8036f/npp-apm_-_e60pv-19equi.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/05/a125bf6784cbb45c6c6652ccdfd8036f/npp-apm_-_e60pv-19equi.pdf)

**Condensed Tender Details:**
----------------------------

*   **Contract Value:** To
